brand_names: Suds High Foaming Antiseptic Hand and Body Wash
warnings: Drug Facts Box OTC-Warnings Section For external use only
dosage_administration: Drug Facts Box OTC-Dosage & Administration Section wet hands and forearms apply 5 milliliters (teaspoonful) or palmful to hands and forearms scrub thoroughly for 1 minute and rinse
indications: Drug Facts Box OTC-Indications & Usage Section for hand-washing to decrease bacteria on the skin
